definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment features of pulmonary heart disease caused by tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肺结核所致肺心病的诊断和治疗特点。

sentences.english: To explore the significance of adenosine deaminase in patients with tuberculous pleurisy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腺苷脱氨酶在结核性胸膜炎中的临床意义。

sentences.english: Objective:To discuss the clinical and pathologic characteristics and effective treatment of renal tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肾结核的临床和病理特征及其有效治疗方法。

sentences.english: Conclusions The non-natives are the major component of TB patients in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 结论外来人口是深圳市结核病疫情的主要组成部分。

sentences.english: The incidence of primary pancreatic tuberculosis may be increasing;
sentences.chinese: 目前，原发性结核性胰脏炎有渐增的趋势。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the value of acid-fast stain test of mycobacterium tuberculosis in the diagnosis of pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解结核分枝杆菌抗酸染色对肺结核的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the value of acid-fast stain test of mycobacterium tuberculosis in the diagnosis of pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解结核分枝杆菌抗酸染色对肺结核的诊断价值。

sentences.english: China is fully implementing the policies to control modern tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 中国全面推行现代结核病控制策略。

sentences.english: Objective To learn the situation of supervision and management of pulmonary tuberculosis(TB) patients by village doctors and its influential factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解村医生督导管理肺结核病人现状及影响因素。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the liver damages caused by antituberculosis drugs.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解抗结核药物引起肺结核患者的肝损害。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the liver damages caused by antituberculosis drugs.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解抗结核药物引起肺结核患者的肝损害。

sentences.english: Tuberculosis of the spine is Pott's disease.
sentences.chinese: 放入是脊柱结核的疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To explore effects of pleural space drainage plus drug infusion in treating tuberculous empyema.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸腔闭式引流法治疗结核性脓胸的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the pulmonary tuberculosis mortality risk of the residents in high background radiation area (HBRA), Yangjiang, China.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨天然放射性高本底地区居民肺结核死亡危险。

sentences.english: City of CDC TB Division Chen Xiubing doctor said.
sentences.chinese: 市疾控中心结核病防治科陈秀兵医师说。

sentences.english: That means not only saving the people with MDR-TB but also the general population.
sentences.chinese: 这不仅意味着拯救耐多药结核病人，也拯救所有的人。
